scripts.merge-dist: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && ncp dist-portal dist && ncp dist-teacher dist/teacher && ncp dist-student dist/student
scripts.build:all: npm run build:portal && npm run build:student && npm run build:teacher
scripts.deploy:unified: npm run build:all && npm run merge-dist && firebase deploy --only hosting:svcm-v2
scripts.deploy:portal: npm run build:portal && firebase deploy --only hosting:svcm-v2
scripts.deploy:student: npm run build:student && firebase deploy --only hosting:dcprime-s
scripts.deploy:teacher: npm run build:teacher && firebase deploy --only hosting:t-dcprime
